resources.string: Android Trivia will help remind you of important concepts you have learned and will learn in Android development.\n\nConsider modifying the questions and graphics to make this game your own!

Select the answer from the options given. Each time you get an answer correct, you advance to the next question.\n\nIf you get the answer wrong, your game ends! You can return to the title screen using up or back from within the game screen, and this will also end your game.

Hi, this is James from Taiwan. 

I am a saxophonist. 

I started to learn sax since I was 13 years old, as a junior high school student. 

I was in the school orchestra, and played as 1st alto sax for the most of the time. 
After 3 years of learing, I went to high school, in which I joined the school Marching Band for a year. 
We went on national music competitions, outdoor marching festivals...etc. The training in marching band was really exhausted, but worth it. 

After that, I went abroad to France for an exchange student program. 
During the stay, I brought an alto sax with me, and went to the local conservatoire as a student and a musician of the city orchestra, fanfare, and jazz band. 

Back to Taiwan, I ended up joining the jazz club in the university, and joined Koswing Big Band afterwards in Tainan. 
It was a very pleasant and a great pleasure to have the opportunity to play along with these great musician.
